info.description: Text prompt below the input box

error-info.description: An error message is displayed below the input box

length.description: The maximum length of the password

gutter.description: The spacing between the input box slots, e.g. '20px' '2em', the default unit is px
gutter.description_zh: 输入框格子之间的间距，如 `20px` `2em`，默认单位为px

mask.description: Whether or not to hide the content of the password

:focused.description: Whether it is focused, the cursor will be displayed when focused
:focused.description_zh: 是否已聚焦，聚焦时会显示光标

events.name: focus
events.description: Triggered when the input box is focused
